alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 7:30PM CDT until April 20 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Polk and Grand Forks Counties. .Minor flooding continues along the Red River at East Grand Forks through tonight, lowering to action stage by the end of the day Tuesday. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at East Grand Forks. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Monday the stage was 28.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:45 PM CDT Monday was 30.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 27.9 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
